mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards(id, title, content, usersId, createdAt) VALUES(boards_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{usersId}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT title, content FROM boards WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT b.id, b.title, u.username FROM boards b INNER JOIN users u ON b.usersId = u.id ORDER BY b.id DESC
